verses.verse: The LORD is King,[b] adorned in splendor; the LORD has clothed and girded himself with strength. [c]He has made the world firm, never to be moved.
Your throne has stood firm from the beginning; you have existed throughout eternity, O LORD.
The waters[d] have lifted up, O LORD; the waters have lifted up their voice; the waters have lifted up their roar.
More powerful than the roar of mighty waters, more powerful than the crashing waves of the sea, mighty on high is the LORD.[e]
Your decrees[f] are firmly established; holiness adorns your house, O LORD, throughout the ages.
